channel.title: Gardening on PrestaShop Developers' blog
channel.description: Recent content in Gardening on PrestaShop Developers' blog

item.title: A year into 1.6 maintenance: the way forward
item.description: A year ago, we released PrestaShop 1.7.0.0, and put version 1.6 in maintenance mode. The plan is to maintain it for two years, with regular patch releases. Approaching the one-year mark, time for a review!

item.title: Let's review pull requests!
item.description: Have you submitted code to PrestaShopâ€™s Core codebase or any of its native module through a pull request on GitHub? Then read on!
